description:
Music has color. Introducing the category "Choose Your Color", which with its dense sound opens our friend from St. Petersburg Alexander Kopshev aka Kpsh. Deep and minimalistic, dynamic and sometimes hypnotic groove definitely will appeal to fans of the genre.

Artist: Kpsh
Color: Rich Black
Genre: Minimal / Tech House

"In childhood the mist scared its external manifestation, as they grow older the veil wrapped and what's inside. The feeling is almost the same — erratic landmarks. Not see and, most troubling, do not perceive their choice — making steps, not knowing that beneath your feet." (Elchin Safarli)

Artist: Francisco Fuentes
Color: Pale Carmine
Genre: Minimal Dub / Downtempo

Do you know what real elegance in music is? This is when you do not need to talk about it much, you just need to listen to it.

Artist: Kooscha
Color: Rose Taupe
Genre: Deep House / Dub Techno

«Of course, it's a dance. Or what do you think I'm doing inside me?..»

Artist: dubtommy
Color: Turtle Green
Genre: Deep House / Dub Techno

Create magic discreetly. Ordinary people shouldn't know that magic really exists.

Artist: Naarky
Color: Light Orchid
Genre: Ambient

I sense...space. A kinda latitude of what we happily call reality, in which, as everybody keeps saying... anything's possible.

Artist: Drifting.Dubs
Color: Licorice
Genre: Deep House / Dub Techno

«Some people were born to sit by the river, some are struck by lightning, some live by music, some are just strange, some swim, some know buttons, some know Shakespeare, some become mothers, and some dance.»

Artist: ALA
Color: Dark Sky Blue
Genre: Dub Techno / Ambient

«And I know what I have to do next... I have to keep breathing because the sun will rise again tomorrow and who knows what the tide will bring...»

Artist: Amanita Phalloides & Heavenchord
Color: Magenta Haze
Genre: Ambient

«Forests are never silent for those who understand their language. And as for talking, only know how to distinguish the voices of the forest, and you will hear a lot of reasonable and instructive speeches.»

Artist: Liuos
Color: Up Forest Green
Genre: Dub Techno / Deep Techno

It's good that there is autumn, it gently and carefully prepares us for the cold. Time for reflection, hands in pockets, mulled wine in the evenings and pleasant melancholy...

Artist: Marcibagoly
Color: Dim Gray
Genre: Ambient

«I also consider myself an artist, but my canvas is my whole life. Some artists can't stand the sight of their creations when they're finished, and I'm my biggest fan.»

Artist: Skytechnic
Color: Desire
Genre: Techno / Deep Techno

«... you should think carefully before you go on a journey beyond your own personality. It may not be easy to go back.»

Artist: R.Hz
Color: Japanese Indigo
Genre: Dub Techno

«Got up in the morning, washed, put himself in order — and immediately put in order your planet.»

Artist: Zub
Color: Thistle
Genre: Dub Techno / Deep House

I would say that now the words «elegance» and «style» mean much more than just beautiful music, it is rather the very attitude to the image you create; the mood that elegant, stylish music can bring only by its presence. And, most importantly, this mood and this image should be natural.

Artist: Basicnoise
Color: Coral
Genre: Dub Techno / Minimal

Life is above all creativity, but this does not mean that every person must be born an artist, a ballerina or a scientist in order to live. No, you can just create a good atmosphere around you...

Artist: Kooscha
Color: Deep Koamaru
Genre: Deep House / Minimal

The future is not affected by the present... on the contrary, the future forms the present. Look at it this way. Once the future is set, events begin to evolve so that the future becomes inevitable.

Artist: Altone
Color: Onyx
Genre: Dub Techno / Minimal

«I'm worried about those who live for others. It looks noble. Having got acquainted with such people, I noticed how unhappy they are, how they overpower themselves. Unfairly. Each of us must necessarily be a happy first debt for himself, then for others - to have something to share.»

Artist: Altone
Color: Deep Green (Thomas Carmody Reshape)
Genre: Dub Techno / Minimal

Simplicity is not only about visual style, minimalism and lack of clutter, to achieve simplicity you need to get to the very depths of complexity.

Artist: Groovedawg
Color: Magic Mint
Genre: Minimal / House

Each mechanism has its purpose. For example, to amuse people or show the time. What if people are like that? And when a man ceases to understand its purpose, he breaks. Like clock.

Artist: Flying Cobra
Color: Brink Pink
Genre: Deep House / Dub Techno

«What did Time smell like? Like dust and clocks and people. And if you wondered what Time sounded like? It sounded like water running in a dark cave and voices crying and dirt dropping down upon hollow box lids, and rain. And, going further, what did Time look like? Time look like snow dropping silently into a black room or it looked like a silent film in an ancient theater, 100 billion faces falling like those New Year balloons, down and down into nothing.»

Artist: JBZ
Color: Spanish Viridian
Genre: Minimal / Tech House

«While the majority gradually realized the value of the car, a talented minority offered the society a plane.»

Artist: Genning
Color: Tufts Blue
Genre: Deep House / Tech House

«Wealth is not in accumulation, but in the ability to choose the best.»

Artist: Vøsne
Color: Eerie Black
Genre: Dub / Dub Techno

«Happiness is the ability to wake up in the morning and fall asleep in the evening, having time to do between these two events what you really like.»

Artist: Echoton
Color: Sunset Orange
Genre: Dub / Minimal

By the way, we are preparing the next 12" EP on spclnch with amazing music from Echoton. Follow the news.

«Everyone has a story. Imagine – there are more than seven billion adventure novels on earth. Novels about love. Thrillers. Detectives. Isn't that interesting?»

Artist: Drifted
Color: Smoky Black
Genre: Dub Techno / Techno

«What is important in the world is what is happening now and here. The rest is scenery. The universe exists in us, and only in us. All galaxies and quasars, displacements and holes, angels and gods are not somewhere there — but here. If there is no man, there will be no universe. There may be others, but not with us or for us.»

Artist: Heavenchord & Amanita Phalloides
Color: Pale Aqua
Genre: Ambient

«For any great career to take place, two terms are needed: a great man and a rarer man – one who is able to see greatness and say so.»

Artist: Malik Faquir
Color: Very Light Tangelo
Genre: Dub Techno / Minimal

«He had a hand in transforming his era, considering himself a producer of happiness, a craftsman, but working as an artist...»

Artist: Heavenchord
Color: Rich Brilliant Lavender
Genre: Dub Techno

«Don't pay any attention to anyone and if you think you can be happy, don 't miss this chance and be happy. As I can judge from my experience, in life there are such chances once or twice, and if you miss them, you regret about it all your life.»

Artist: Tender H
Color: Mint Cream
Genre: Dub Techno

«There are moments in every man's life to which he must submit. If he misses this moment, he will have a long, colorless life before he is rewarded with a new one.»

Artist: Drifting.Dubs
Color: Laurel Green
Genre: House, Minimal

«Aesthetics is a special subtle and beautiful feeling. Such a rare fleur that not many people have.»

Artist: Avguchenko
Color: Flax
Genre: Dub Techno / Techno

Lofidub music (Andrey Avguchenko's alter ego) is born by sampling and resampling various sound material, which is then destroyed in various ways and mixed together, creating a kind of lo-fi sound.

Artist: Lofidub
Color: Silver
Genre: Dub Techno / Techno

"The love of life grew out of the realization that nothing in it is given for free, that a person himself must understand what his desire is, and must himself seek its fulfillment."

By the way, the original version of Basicnoise's track will soon be released on vinyl. Follow the news.

Artist: Basicnoise
Color: Turquoise / Consequences (Kooscha remix)
Genre: Dub Techno / Dubby House

"Close your eyes and see."

Artist: Schulz Audio
Color: Mauve
Genre: Dub Techno / Deep House

"I don't think there is any other quality so essential to any kind of success as perseverance."

Original version of Basicnoise's track will soon be released on vinyl. Follow the news.

Artist: Basicnoise
Color: Electric Blue / Consequences (Takuya Morita remix)
Genre: Dub Techno

"There are days when seemingly nothing happened, but you suddenly rolls incredible happiness; you have sorted out old clothes or going up to the counter junk, suddenly see the exact same toy, what was yours as a child, or someone gently takes your hand, or the bell rang you waited or do you say something good, or your child hugs you – he asks for nothing, wants for a moment to feel your love. There are such blessed days when you are happy with a familiar smell, a ray of sunlight coming through the curtains, the sound of a shower outside the window when you Wake up, snow on the sidewalk or the arrival of spring and burst kidneys."

Artist: Heavenchord
Color: Jasmine
Genre: Dub Techno

"To live, man must hold three things as the supreme and ruling values of his life: Reason, Purpose, Self-esteem."

Artist: Flying Cobra
Color: Tyrian Purple
Genre: Dub Techno

"Everyone who has ever engaged in any creative work knows what joy and satisfaction a work created with their own hands brings. But this is nothing compared to the process of creating your own destiny."

Artist: Liuos
Color: Up Maroon
Genre: Dub Techno / Deep House

"Be busy. It is the cheapest medicine on earth — and one of the most effective."

Artist: Upwellings
Color: Eminence
Genre: Dub Techno / House

PS: expect a full-length EP from Kooscha very soon.

Artist: Kooscha
Color: Moss Green
Genre: Dub Techno / Minimal House

PS. Alexander Bogdanov's amazing full-length EP will be released very soon.

Artist: Alexander Bogdanov
Color: Dark Cornflower Blue
Genre: Dub Techno / Deep Techno

Artist: Are Morica
Color: Irresistible
Genre: Techno / Deep Techno

Artist: R.Hz
Color: Paolo Veronese Green
Genre: Techno / Dub Techno

Artist: BT Gate X-138
Color: Space Cadet
Genre: Dub Techno / Ambient

Artist: Lejazz
Color: Orange Soda
Genre: Deep House / Dub House

Artist: Marcibagoly
Color: Blue Jeans
Genre: Ambient

Artist: Le Code
Color: Independence
Genre: Deep House / Melodic Techno

Artist: Altone
Color: Super Pink
Genre: Dub Techno / Techno

Artist: Dott. Santafeo
Color: Satin Sheen Gold
Genre: Dub Techno / Techno

Artist: Skytechnic
Color: Cool Grey
Genre: Dub Techno / Deep Techno

Artist: Kpsh
Color: Pansy Purple
Genre: Deep House / Minimal

Artist: Ikosaeder
Color: Xanadu
Genre: Deep House / Dub

Artist: Francisco Aguado
Color: Amethyst
Genre: Deep House / Dub Techno

Artist: Upwellings
Color: Polished Pine
Genre: Dub Techno

Artist: Dub Portrait
Color: Blue Pigment
Genre: Dub Techno
